widgets_values:
当 MiniCPM VQA 同时接收到图像和视频信息时，它会仅处理视频信息而忽略图像信息。如果您想处理图像信息，请断开视频信息的输入。

When MiniCPM VQA simultaneously receives both image and video information, it processes only the video information while ignoring the image information. If you want to process the image information, please disconnect the input of the video information.

The image presents a stunning view of Earth from space, showcasing the planet's curvature and its intricate blend of landmasses and oceans. The globe is positioned centrally in the frame, with the North American continent prominently displayed on the left side, extending towards Central America and parts of South America. The Atlantic Ocean stretches across the center, while the Pacific Ocean occupies the right side.

The Earth's surface is depicted in vivid colors, highlighting the green of the continents, the blue of the oceans, and the white of clouds. This color palette not only provides a realistic representation but also adds depth to the image, making it visually captivating.

In the background, a starry sky extends into the distance, adding an element of vastness and infinity to the scene. On the top right corner, there's a small celestial body that could be interpreted as a distant planet or moon, further enhancing the cosmic theme of the image.

Overall, this image beautifully captures the awe-inspiring view of our home planet as seen from space, emphasizing both its natural beauty and its place within the larger universe.
